Monsters and Player level have a dynamic scaling system
It allows low level players to be useful even in a high level battle
And prevents high level players to be one shot low level ones

Keep in mind, even though low levels deal more damage to high levels and receive less
Difference in gear and skills still gives the higher level player an advantage
But it is possible to hunt down a 80 level player with a group of 52 level bandits

Good luck!
